name: Potion
effect:
Restores 120 HP to one target.
Learning Potion Lore 1 ups recovery by 20%.
Learning Potion Lore 2 ups recovery by 30%.
Learning Potion Lore 3 ups recovery by 40%.
Wearing Pheasant Netsuke ups recovery by 50%.
Wearing Nihopalaoa reverses healing effects.

name: Hi-Potion
effect:
Restores 450 HP to one target.
Learning Potion Lore 1 ups recovery by 20%.
Learning Potion Lore 2 ups recovery by 30%.
Learning Potion Lore 3 ups recovery by 40%.
Wearing Pheasant Netsuke ups recovery by 50%.
Wearing Nihopalaoa reverses healing effects.

name: X-Potion
effect:
Restores 1500 HP to one target.
Learning Potion Lore 1 ups recovery by 20%.
Learning Potion Lore 2 ups recovery by 30%.
Learning Potion Lore 3 ups recovery by 40%.
Wearing Pheasant Netsuke ups recovery by 50%.
Wearing Nihopalaoa reverses healing effects.

name: Ether
effect:
Restores 50 MP to one target.
Learning Ether Lore 1 ups recovery by 10%.
Learning Ether Lore 2 ups recovery by 15%.
Learning Ether Lore 3 ups recovery by 30%.
Wearing Pheasant Netsuke ups recovery by 50%.
Wearing Nihopalaoa reverses healing effects.

name: Hi-Ether
effect:
Restores 200 MP to one target.
Learning Ether Lore 1 ups recovery by 10%.
Learning Ether Lore 2 ups recovery by 15%.
Learning Ether Lore 3 ups recovery by 30%.
Wearing Pheasant Netsuke ups recovery by 50%.
Wearing Nihopalaoa reverses healing effects.

name: Elixir
effect:
Completely recovers all HP and all MP of one target.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will reduce HP and MP to 1, but it doesn't work on enemies with Safety passive ability.

name: Megalixir
effect:
Completely recovers all HP and all MP of all targets in range.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will reduce HP and MP to 1, but it doesn't work on enemies with Safety passive ability.

name: Remedy
effect:
Removes Slow, Silence, Blind and Poison from one target.
Learn Remedy Lore 1 to remove Sleep, Disable, Immobilize and Sap.
Learn Remedy Lore 2 to remove Petrify, Confuse and Oil.
Learn Remedy Lore 3 to remove Stop, Doom and Disease.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will instead inflict all of those statuses - you need to have all Lore licenses learned to inflict all statuses.
Remedy doesn't cure X-Zone, KO, Stone, Reverse and Critical HP statuses.

name: Phoenix Down
effect:
Revives one KOed ally with 20% MAX HP.
Inflicts KO on undead foe (some have Safety passive ability, so KO will not work on these).
Learn one Phoenix Lore to revive KOed ally with 30% HP.
Learn two Phoenix Lores to revive KOed ally with 40% HP.
Learn three Phoenix Lores to revive KOed ally with 50% HP.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will KO the target, but it won't work on undead foes and foes with Safety passive ability.
Wearing Pheasant Netsuke doubles potency of Phoenix Down.

name: Gold Needle
effect:
Removes Stone from one ally.
Removes Petrify from one target.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will inflict Petrify.

name: Echo Herbs
effect:
Removes Silence from one target.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will inflict Silence.

name: Antidote
effect:
Removes Poison from one target.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will inflict Poison.

name: Eye Drops
effect:
Removes Blind from one target.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will inflict Blind.

name: Alarm Clock
effect:
Removes Sleep from one target.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will inflict Sleep.

name: Handkerchief
effect:
Removes Oil from one target.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will inflict Oil.

name: Chronos Tear
effect:
Removes Slow and/or Stop from one target.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will inflict Slow and Stop.

name: Smelling Salts
effect:
Removes Confuse from one target.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will inflict Confuse.

name: C9H8O4
effect:
Removes Disease from one target.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will inflict Disease.

name: Bacchus' Wine
effect:
Adds Berserk on one target.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will remove Berserk from one target.

name: Shitamachi no
effect:
Karubadosu     EFF One target gains Bravery.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will remove Bravery from one target.

name: Soleil Fang
effect:
Inflicts fractional fire mgd to all targets in range.
Damage dealt equals 25% of target's MAX HP.
Base chance for hitting is 50%.
Striking at target's fire weakness ups damage by 50%.
Weapon that powers up fire element ups damage by 50%.
Wearing Pheasant Netsuke ups the damage by 50%.
note: This item has replaced Red Fang.

name: Freezing Fang
effect:
Inflicts fractional ice mgd to all targets in range.
Damage dealt equals 25% of target's MAX HP.
Base chance for hitting is 50%.
Striking at target's ice weakness ups damage by 50%.
Weapon that powers up ice element ups damage by 50%.
Wearing Pheasant Netsuke ups the damage by 50%.
note: This item has replaced Blue Fang.

name: Thunder Fang
effect:
Inflicts fractional thunder mgd to all targets in range.
Damage dealt equals 25% of target's MAX HP.
Base chance for hitting is 50%.
Striking at target's thunder weakness ups damage by 50%.
Weapon that powers up thunder element ups damage by 50%.
Wearing Pheasant Netsuke ups the damage by 50%.
note: This item has replaced White Fang.

name: Dark Mote
effect:
Deals dark mgd to all targets in range.
Power of the Mote is 28, and ignores target's Reflect.

name: Aero Mote
effect:
Deals wind mgd to all targets in range.
Power of the Mote is 48, and ignores target's Reflect.

name: Aqua Mote
effect:
Deals water mgd to all targets in range.
Power of the Mote is 60, and ignores target's Reflect.
note: This item has replaced Water Mote.

name: Bio Mote
effect:
Adds Sap and deals non-elemental mgd to all targets in range.
Power of the Mote is 88, and ignores target's Reflect.

name: Aeroga Mote
effect:
Deals wind mgd to all targets in range.
Power of the Mote is 102, and ignores target's Reflect.

name: Shock Mote
effect:
Deals non-elemental mgd to one target.
Power of the Mote is 133, and ignores target's Reflect.

name: Holy Mote
effect:
Deals holy mgd to one target.
Power of the Mote is 145, and ignores target's Reflect.

name: Scathe Mote
effect:
Deals non-elemental mgd to all targets in range.
Power of the Mote is 191, and ignores target's Reflect.

name: Balance Mote
effect:
Inflicts non-elemental mgd to all targets in range.
Damage = (user's MAX HP - user's current HP) It ignores target's Reflect.

name: Gravity Mote
effect:
Deals fractional mgd to all targets in range.
Damage equals 25% of target's MAX HP.
It ignores target's Reflect.

name: Warp Mote
effect:
Banishes all foes in range.
Doesn't work on foes with Safety passive ability.

name: Dispel Mote
effect:
Removes beneficial status effects from one target, and can remove Slow and Stop as well.
It ignores target's Reflect.

name: Cura Mote
effect:
Recovers medium amount of HP to all targets in range.
Damages undead.
It ignores target's Reflect.

name: Bubble Mote
effect:
One target gains Bubble.
It ignores target's Reflect.

name: Reverse Mote
effect:
Adds Reverse to one target.
It ignores target's Reflect.

name: Hastega Mote
effect:
All targets in range gain Haste.
It ignores target's Reflect.

name: Reflectga Mote
effect:
All targets in range gain Reflect.
It ignores target's Reflect.

name: Vanishga Mote
effect:
All targets in range gain Vanish.
It ignores target's Reflect.

name: Float Mote
effect:
All allies in range gain Float.
It ignores target's Reflect.

name: Eksir Berries
effect:
Deals dark mgd to one target.
Power of the Berries is 30.

name: Barutoro no Tane
effect:
One target gains Protect, Shell, Haste, Bravery, Faith, Invisible, Regen, Float, Bubble, and Libra statuses.
Wearing Nihopalaoa removes all of the above statuses from one target.

name: Dark Matter
effect:
Deals physical damage to all targets in range.
Max damage = 60000 Damage of Dark Matter increases with each use of Knot of Rust (or Devour Soul esper tech): <DMG =SUM(Knot of Rust DMG) / 3 +SUM(Devour Soul DMG) / 3> Once Dark Matter is used, its damage resets to zero (0).

name: Dark Energy
effect:
Deals 50000 physical damage to all targets in range.
An extremely powerful item, but incredibly hard to obtain.

name: Meteorite (A)
effect:
Adds Sap to one target.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will remove Sap from one target.

name: Meteorite (B)
effect:
Adds Disease to one target.
Wearing Nihopalaoa will remove Disease from one target.

name: Meteorite (C)
effect:
Deals physical dagame to one target.
Damage range equals [0 ~ <user's MAX HP - 1>] = dmg.

name: Meteorite (D)
effect:
Deals physical damage to one target.
It has 50% chance to deal 30000 dmg, and 50% chance to deal [0 ~ 9999] damage.

name: Knot of Rust
effect:
Deals physical damage to one target.
Max damage = 9999 Damage dealt is partially affected by chr's maximum HP value.
Knot of Rust deals damage by this formula: <DMG = MAX HP / RND(1~10)> Increase the damage done by Knot of Rust by being under Bubble status.
